allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix SignatureMismatch error when listing bucket objects

AWS v4 signing requires query string parameters to be sorted
alphabetically in the canonical request. The signing code wasn''t
actually sorting them, causing signature mismatches on requests
with multiple query parameters \(like ListObjectsV2\).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
